title: Greek Chicken Souvlaki
description: Traditional Greek marinated chicken skewers with lemon, oregano, and garlic
ingredients: 1 ½ lbs boneless skinless chicken thighs (juicier than breast, but breast works)
2 tsp dried oregano (or 1 tbsp fresh, chopped)
instructions: Marinate: In a bowl, mix olive oil, lemon juice & zest, garlic, oregano, salt, pepper. Toss chicken in. Cover and chill at least 30 min (2–4 hrs best).
Skewer: Thread chicken onto skewers (if wooden, soak in water 30 min first).

Cook: Grill on medium-high for 8–10 min total, turning once or twice. Or oven broil 6–8 min per side on a sheet pan with rack. Or stovetop pan: Cast-iron skillet, 3–4 min per side until charred and cooked through (165°F internal).
notes: Serve with falafel, pita, and lots of dips: tzatziki, toum (garlic sauce), hummus. Add toppings: tomato, cucumber, red onion, olives, feta, pickled turnip. Grain option: bulgur, rice pilaf, or couscous.
